name: Orby Ball: Spin The Color Dash
name_original: Orby Ball: Spin The Color Dash
description:
Orby Ball is a challenging arcade game that will keep you entertained for hours! Fun, challenging and suitable for all ages!

Tap on the screen to switch the spinning direction of the ball on the orbit. Hit objects of the same color as the ball to score and try to avoid those with a different color or you’ll have to start again. Don't forget to collect coins on the way to unlock new awesome balls!

Orby Ball has many awesome features:
*Simple one-tap gameplay full of action.
*Exciting new balls to unlock.
*Suitable for everyone.

Download it today for FREE and start challenging your friends to see who will get the highest score! Have fun and enjoy!
